About.title: About Me
About.description: As a dedicated System and Network Administrator, I focus on reliability, performance, and cybersecurity awareness. I value responsiveness and precision in minimizing downtime and ensuring business continuity.

items.title: CNPS Cameroon
items.description: Improved network monitoring using AI. Developed a WhatsApp chatbot for Zabbix analytics and implemented proactive incident detection via machine learning.
